name: DayCounts Up To Date
author: Jeremy Magne

sections.description:
When you install this plugin on your WordPress site, you will allow DayCounts to access some information like the list of plugins and their version.
DayCounts provides a service of monitoring, backup and update in order to keep your website up to date.

DayCounts can only access the data once you have communicated the unique key that is generated in the plugins settings.
sections.installation:
1. Upload uptodate.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Click on the settings link. You will get a unique identifier that you will have to communicate to DayCounts.
  4. Save the settings.
sections.changelog:

1.0.3

1.0.2

1.0.1

  • Added plugin update functionality.

1.0.0

  • Initial release.
